comment.author: 19775852@N03
comment._content: Why is Robert Adams the architect for a building completed in 1796?

comment.author: 30515687@N05
comment._content: Good question! We're going to look into this, and we'll let you know what we turn up.

comment.author: 19775852@N03
comment._content: I work at the estate actually! There's a Robert Adams who was a Scottish Architect in the late 1700s who developed the style that the house was built in, but the house was designed by William Hamilton who lived in the mansion.

comment.author: 30515687@N05
comment._content: Thanks for the information! I'm passing it along to the cataloger who originally worked on these images.
